languages.text: За каждым кристаллом, без труда вынутым из ветхих песочных стен, следует обрушение целых кварталов. Вскоре полость внутри астероида заполняется густым пыльным туманом — дальнейшая добыча флогистона из сыпучих руин потребует больше времени.

traits.locale_text: За каждым кристаллом, без труда вынутым из ветхих песочных стен, следует обрушение целых кварталов. Вскоре полость внутри астероида заполняется густым пыльным туманом — дальнейшая добыча флогистона из сыпучих руин потребует больше времени.

languages.text: With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.
languages.original_text: За каждым кристаллом, без труда вынутым из ветхих песочных стен, следует обрушение целых кварталов. Вскоре полость внутри астероида заполняется густым пыльным туманом — дальнейшая добыча флогистона из сыпучих руин потребует больше времени.

traits.locale_text: With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

languages.text: 小队毫不费力地从破败的沙墙上取走了所有水晶，随后整座城市的街区都倒塌了。不一会儿，小行星内部的洞穴中就充满了厚厚的尘雾。如果想在崩塌的废墟中继续收集燃素，恐怕要花上更多时间。
languages.original_text: With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

traits.locale_text: 小队毫不费力地从破败的沙墙上取走了所有水晶，随后整座城市的街区都倒塌了。不一会儿，小行星内部的洞穴中就充满了厚厚的尘雾。如果想在崩塌的废墟中继续收集燃素，恐怕要花上更多时间。

languages.text: 老朽化した砂壁から水晶がひとつひとつ取り除かれるたびに、都市のブロック全体が崩壊していく。小惑星内部の空洞が濃い塵のような霧で満たされるのに、それほど時間はかからない。だが崩壊した廃墟からフロギストンを回収するには、さらに時間がかかるだろう。
languages.original_text: With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

traits.locale_text: 老朽化した砂壁から水晶がひとつひとつ取り除かれるたびに、都市のブロック全体が崩壊していく。小惑星内部の空洞が濃い塵のような霧で満たされるのに、それほど時間はかからない。だが崩壊した廃墟からフロギストンを回収するには、さらに時間がかかるだろう。

languages.text: Con cada cristal que se extrae sin esfuerzo de las ruinosas paredes de arena se derrumban bloques enteros de la ciudad. La cavidad del interior del asteroide no tarda en llenarse de una espesa niebla polvorienta: la futura recuperación del flogisto de las ruinas derruidas llevará más tiempo.
languages.original_text: With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

traits.locale_text: Con cada cristal que se extrae sin esfuerzo de las ruinosas paredes de arena se derrumban bloques enteros de la ciudad. La cavidad del interior del asteroide no tarda en llenarse de una espesa niebla polvorienta: la futura recuperación del flogisto de las ruinas derruidas llevará más tiempo.

languages.text: Sobald ein Kristall mühelos aus den brüchigen Sandwänden entnommen wird, bricht eine ganze Reihe von Gebäuden zusammen. Es dauert nicht lang, bis die Höhle im Inneren des Asteroiden von einem dichten Staubnebel erfüllt ist. Es wird länger dauern, das übrige Flogiston aus den zerbröckelten Ruinen zu bergen.
languages.original_text: With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

traits.locale_text: Sobald ein Kristall mühelos aus den brüchigen Sandwänden entnommen wird, bricht eine ganze Reihe von Gebäuden zusammen. Es dauert nicht lang, bis die Höhle im Inneren des Asteroiden von einem dichten Staubnebel erfüllt ist. Es wird länger dauern, das übrige Flogiston aus den zerbröckelten Ruinen zu bergen.

languages.text: À chaque cristal extrait sans effort des murs de sables délabrés, des pans entiers de la ville s'effondrent. Bientôt, la cavité interne de l'astéroïde s'emplit d'un épais nuage de poussière qui ne va certes pas faciliter la récupération du phlogiston restant.
languages.original_text: With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.

traits.locale_text: À chaque cristal extrait sans effort des murs de sables délabrés, des pans entiers de la ville s'effondrent. Bientôt, la cavité interne de l'astéroïde s'emplit d'un épais nuage de poussière qui ne va certes pas faciliter la récupération du phlogiston restant.

languages.text: Tüm kristallerin harap hâldeki kumdan duvarlardan kolayca alınmasıyla şehrin koca koca binaları çöküyor. Çok geçmeden asteroidin içindeki boşluk yoğun bir toz bulutuyla doluyor... Ufalanan harabelerden daha fazla flogiston toplamak uzun sürecek.
languages.original_text: With each crystal effortlessly removed from the dilapidated sand walls, entire blocks of the city collapse. It does not take long for the cavity inside the asteroid to fill with a thick dusty fog — further recovery of the flogiston from the crumbling ruins will take more time.
